title: Here's what it will take to resolve the supply-chain disruptions roiling the U.S. economy
text:
Apple's â€˜ad-mageddon' is affecting Snap, Facebook, Google and Twitter differently

Alphabet Inc.'s Google and Twitter Inc. managed to avoid bigger hits to their revenue in the third quarter from the privacy changes by Apple, with both companies noting that they experienced modest impacts. See full story.

U.S. stock futures edge higher as earnings roll in from Boeing, McDonald's and GM

On the heels of another record session for the Dow and S&P 500, stock-index futures edge higher as investors sift through a heavy slate of corporate results. See full story.

Another rough day for MAGA meme stocks, but at least they're not Robinhood

DWAC was not having PHUN, but it remains up huge since last week, thanks to the kind of hope that investors are now losing in Robinhood. See full story.

Shiba Inu is the third most googled crypto in 2021, new study shows

Shiba Inu receives 2.8 million searches on average per month so far in 2021, according to a recent study by Bacancy Technology. That is a fraction of the 22 million average monthly search volume of bitcoin and below the 6.3 million of ethereum. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

'My ex-husband's mother is a dishonest and conniving individual who will beg, borrow, cheat and steal for her "baby boy" or herself.' See full story.
